revised_title: Obituary Notices of Fellows Deceased: Sir Andrew Noble
tldr: This article is an obituary for Sir Andrew Noble, a prominent figure in the development of rifled artillery and a key player in the establishment of the Elswick Ordnance Company. It covers his life, military career, and contributions to the field of artillery, as well as the history of the company and its role in supplying the British military with advanced weaponry.
